title: Pi-DE infinite scroll client with history prepending
summary: Implemented infinite scroll client with history prepending. Added FetchHistoryRequest and HistoryPageResponse protocol types; implemented RemoteAgent.fetchHistory() and history_page handler with pagination state management; added useAgent hooks for loading state and cursor tracking; implemented scroll detection with debouncing and scroll position restoration; styled loading indicator. All 94 tests passing.
